messages.subject: General group info!
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry about recent spam.  It’s not the fault of the seeming mailer.  Her provider sent a long blah blah blah mailing including this very true factoid: -=-
messages.messageBody:
Sorry about recent spam. It’s not the fault of the seeming mailer. Her provider sent a long blah blah blah mailing including this very true factoid:
-=- Unfortunately there are numerous ways in which spammers can match your address with somebody from your contacts without gaining access to your account.-=-

This can happen to anyone, and it’s a horrible truth of internet vandalism.

Clare’s writing is wonderful and I had taken her off moderation, but I’ve put her back on to protect the group from possible future eruption (no fault of Clare’s).

So to feel better about Clare (and unschooling, and yourself), read here: http://sandradodd.com/clare

Post here! I wish this group would have more activity. If you want to tell a recent success story, this would be a good place for it. :-)

Thanks for reading, and I’m sorry for recent irritations created by vandalizing bots in the ether.

Sandra
